statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{5 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x - 3 , 8 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x , -5 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x + 3 , 10 \, x^{3} - 16 \, x^{2} + 16 \, x - 6 , 4 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
